physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hypotonic at birth, elongated face, high-arched palate, weak cry, large pinnae, short hands, tapering fingers, clinodactyly, and reduced tendon reflexes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Feeding difficulties and hypotonia improved over the years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dorsal kyphoscoliosis evident, absent sympathetic skin responses from hands and feet.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Mean diurnal and nocturnal values showed minimal difference; significant fluctuation with normal MESOR, reduced amplitude, and slightly advanced acrophase.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Two episodes of hyperhidrosis recorded; the increase of body core temperature started at the beginning of both episodes.
